import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; import SingleEventTwo from '../../components/Event/SingleEventTwo'; const EventSidebarMain = () => { const [events, setEvents] = React.useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = React.useState(true); useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:5000/affevent') .then(response => { setEvents(response.data); setLoading(false); }) .catch(error => { console.error('Error fetching events:', error); setLoading(false); }); }, []); if (loading) { return
